trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Capture VM Image</languageKeyword> operation creates a copy of the operating system virtual hard disk (VHD) and all of the data VHDs that are associated with the Virtual Machine, saves the VHD copies in the same storage location as the original VHDs, and registers the copies as a VM Image in the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Capture VM Image</languageKeyword> operation creates a copy of the operating system virtual hard disk (VHD) and all of the data VHDs that are associated with the Virtual Machine, saves the VHD copies in the same storage location as the original VHDs, and registers the copies as a VM Image in the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Capture VM Image</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Capture VM Image</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2014-02-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2014-02-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the format of the request body:
trans-unit.target: The following example shows the format of the request body:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of the operating system in the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the state of the operating system in the image.

trans-unit.source: A Virtual Machine that is fully configured and running contains a <languageKeyword>Specialized</languageKeyword> operating system.
trans-unit.target: A Virtual Machine that is fully configured and running contains a <languageKeyword>Specialized</languageKeyword> operating system.

trans-unit.source: A Virtual Machine on which the Sysprep command has been run with the generalize option contains a <languageKeyword>Generalized</languageKeyword> operating system.
trans-unit.target: A Virtual Machine on which the Sysprep command has been run with the generalize option contains a <languageKeyword>Generalized</languageKeyword> operating system.

trans-unit.source: If you capture an image from a generalized Virtual Machine, the machine is deleted after the image is captured.
trans-unit.target: If you capture an image from a generalized Virtual Machine, the machine is deleted after the image is captured.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that all Virtual Machines are shut down before capturing an image.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended that all Virtual Machines are shut down before capturing an image.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Sysprep command, see <externalLink><linkText>How to Use Sysprep: AN Introduction</linkText><linkUri>http://technet.microsoft.com/library/bb457073.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Sysprep command, see <externalLink><linkText>How to Use Sysprep: AN Introduction</linkText><linkUri>http://technet.microsoft.com/library/bb457073.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the label of the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the label of the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the description of the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the description of the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Description</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Description</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the language of the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the language of the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Language</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Language</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a value that can be used to group VM Images.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a value that can be used to group VM Images.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>ImageFamily</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>ImageFamily</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size to use for the Virtual Machine that is created from the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the size to use for the Virtual Machine that is created from the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>RecommendedVMSize</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>RecommendedVMSize</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: To get a list of VM Images that you have captured, you can use <link xlink:href="46d2c938-0998-42e4-9343-8f8dd7a8d146" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List VM Images</link>.
trans-unit.target: To get a list of VM Images that you have captured, you can use <link xlink:href="46d2c938-0998-42e4-9343-8f8dd7a8d146" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List VM Images</link>.
